group_1.textLeft: The next match will be more cultured!@We're going to have a drawing contest!

group_1.textRight: What?! I'm amazin' at drawin' pictures!

group_1.textLeft: My, I didn't expect this kind of confidence.@You're both so sure of yourselves!

group_1.textRight: What? Why is that a surprise?

group_1.textLeft: Oh! [chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.6][chara:301101:cheek_0][chara:301101:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:301101:lipSynch_1]Uh, sorry...
A-anyway! [chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.6][chara:301101:cheek_0][chara:301101:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:301101:lipSynch_1]We need something to draw... @Hmm...
That's it! It's a drawing contest, so you@should both use the same subject!
[chara:301101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Me? What?!
Y-you think so?
Well, you both did say you're good at@drawing, didn't you?

group_1.textRight: Sure did, sure did! I'M good at drawin',@at least.

group_1.textLeft: (In that case, I'm kind of interested...@I wonder if they'll make me look pretty?)
Okay, I'll be your subject!

group_1.textRight: Cool! This is a battle to show whose art@is the strongest!

group_1.textLeft: Just how I want it!

group_1.textCenter: (Strongest? I'm sure that means best, right?)

group_1.textLeft: (Wh-who knew being a model was so@nerve-wracking...)

group_1.textRight: (Gotta draw her body like...this...[chara:302801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302801:cheek_0][chara:302801:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]@There, there, there! PERFECT!)

group_1.textCenter: (I'll draw Kako holdin' this here... @[chara:100501:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100501:cheek_0][chara:100501:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]Wow, it looks really cool!)

group_1.textLeft: (They're both totally absorbed...@I can't wait to see what they drew...!)
Almost done? Did you finish drawing?
Then it's time to present them! First up@is Ayame!

...[chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.5][chara:301101:cheek_0][chara:301101:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:301101:lipSynch_1][chara:301101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Uhh...huh? [chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.5][chara:301101:motion_400][chara:301101:lipSynch_1]Hmm... What???
Is this supposed to be...me?
[chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301101:lipSynch_1]The muscles are so...bulging...

group_1.textRight: Yeah! D'ya like it? Huh, huh, huh?@It looks super cool, right?!

group_1.textLeft: W-why am I...so... [chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301101:cheek_2][chara:301101:face_mtn_ex_022.exp.json][chara:301101:lipSynch_1]Ooogh...
(I hope Felicia's picture is better.)

group_1.textRight: So that's the direction you went, huh?@Not bad...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]("Not bad"?![chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301101:cheek_0][chara:301101:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json] I have a bad feeling about@this...)
Well, now it's Felicia's turn, so please@show us your picture...
...@...[chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301101:lipSynch_1]W...Why...?
I have...so many weapons...

group_1.textRight: Darn right! Swords, cannons, hammers...@Machine guns, nunchucks...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]But why?! Why do I have them?!

group_1.textRight: It hurts to admit it, but my rival drew a@pretty sweet picture...

group_1.textLeft: (They're taking the "strong art" idea@far, far too literally!)
[chara:301101:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain](And they both interpreted it the same way!)
